string-array.name: Anxiety Questions
string-array.item: For the past two weeks are you feeling restless like you are unable to sit in one place?
Have you been concerned about more than one thing for the past 2 weeks ?
Have you been agitated or tensed from the past 2 weeks?
For the past 2 weeks have you had trouble staying calm?
Have you struggled to control feelings of anxiety, agitation or fear, in the past 2 weeks?
Have you felt ill tempered or moody in the past 2 weeks?
Have you panicked about things that might happen to you or the ones closed to you in the past 2 weeks?
Have you been having any irrational fears, from certain things for the past 2 weeks?
